title: ward skins
body: so im playing and i open my ward skins to find that my candy cane ward skin is just gone......but why......riot.....why

replies.body: I don't even have the option to click on ward skin selector anymore. it vanished XD i have a few ward skins too, all stuck with one.

This is currently a known issue, and only a visual one.  Despite being unlocked on the account, some ward skins aren't selectable in-game.  I don't have any information on when this will be resolved right now, but we will be posting updates on our[ service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I hope that helps bring some relief!
